conv_purpose: User intends to create a short poetic piece that captures the essence of autumn with a specific tone or style in mind.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests a creative poem about autumn, focusing on the vivid imagery of falling leaves and the change in weather.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the dialogue with a request for a creative writing piece, aligning with the user's interest in literature and artistic expression.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the style of the poem from descriptive to more metaphorical, aiming to convey deeper emotions associated with the season.
summarized prompts.explanation: The summarized prompt follows the 'Refinement' structure by changing the poem's style to enhance emotional depth without changing the topic or adding new constraints.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: The user aims to craft a creatively written poem centered on the theme of human emotion, specifically focusing on the interplay between joy and melancholy.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user initiates the conversation by requesting a creative poem capturing the duality of joy and sadness within the human experience.
summarized prompts.explanation: The initial prompt sets the groundwork for a creative writing task focusing on human emotions, aligning with the dialogue's creative writing type.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the style of the poem requested in the last round's prompt to include more vivid imagery for enhancing emotional depth.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'refinement' structure by altering the constraint regarding style, aiming to deepen the poem's emotional expression without changing its theme or adding new constraints.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user recalls the blend of joy and sadness captured in the creative structure of the poem discussed in dialogue c1 and asks for its expansion to include a metaphorical journey representing these emotions.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'callback' structure, as the user references content from c1 to build upon it by integrating a journey metaphor that enhances the thematic exploration initiated in the first round.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: User is crafting a creative short story about an artist's journey, seeking to develop ideas for different elements of the story and then summarize them.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User begins by requesting a brainstorming session to generate ideas about a struggling artist's unique journey and key experiences in their creative process.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user initiates the dialogue by establishing the main theme for discussion, which sets the stage for following prompts that will build upon this initial idea.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by narrowing down on specific experiences from the brainstormed ideas and asks for more detailed scenarios or moments that could be pivotal in the artist's journey.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt is a follow-up as the user builds upon the initial brainstorming session by introducing additional constraints, focusing on specific experiences and deepening the exploration.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed in the previous rounds to consolidate the developed ideas into a cohesive narrative outline for the short story.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is a summary prompt because the user is asking for a consolidation of the detailed ideas and scenarios discussed in earlier dialogues into a unified overview of the story.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: The user aims to create a short story with a poetic theme, exploring different elements and bringing them together creatively.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for a unique premise for a short story centered around a mystical forest where time flows differently.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the conversation with a clear topic for creative writing, setting the stage for further exploration.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking for creative descriptions of the forest's environment, such as the flora and fauna.
summarized prompts.explanation: The prompt adheres to the 'follow-up' structure by building on the story premise introduced in the previous round, requesting more specific details.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user recalls elements of mystical time flow and forest environment mentioned in (c1) and (c2) and asks for a gripping opening scene that incorporates these elements.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt fits the 'callback' structure, as it integrates ideas discussed in earlier rounds to craft the opening scene of the story.
